posts.post_content:
I've had many posts in the last mouth, and tried never to be a "BST hog" keeping only two, maybe three, on first page.  Now that I've fallen off page 1, I figured I'd post the remaining 200+ cards I have.  They are all on ebay (sg713), which is convenient for viewing.


[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=141493342621&ssPageName=STRK%3AMESELX%3AIT&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]


Of course, they have "ebay prices" attached to them.

If interested, please contact me at [url]mybuddyinc@yaoo.com[/url] for "net54 prices."


-----------------


Also, now that I've gotten your attention (and please don't bad mouth* me for doing so).  For those who don't follow The Trading Post, any help on the following would be greatly appreciated (everything on ebay is available for trade):

Here is my want list:

HOF (f/g):

Need, for upgrade:

Cobb, bat off
Johnson, portrait
Young, port.

Young, glove shows -- I have a Polar Bear example, but would love to trade it for an equally conditioned Piedmont or Sweet Caporal (scan attached)

SL (g/vg):

Breitenstein
Foster
Shag

I have 5 attached SL scans (Thornton is not available).  I would trade straight up any for Breitenstein or Foster.  
However, I would trade any two for a single Shag in equal or better condition.


Common, Piedmont or Sweet Caporal only (g/vg):

Durham


:eek::

Demmitt, StL (p)

As always, O'Hara for trade.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=177823&d=1423075104[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=177824&d=1423075205[/IMG]


*

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=178173&d=1423324433[/IMG]
Received cards yesterday.  That was super fast shipping!  And, great prices.  Thanks!

Hi,

I just wanted to post some positive feedback for Scott. I bought six cards from him. They were all exactly as described and he could not have shipped them any quicker. I think I received them in two days from the time that I contacted him to buy the cards.

This was a very positive transaction and I give him my highest recommendations.

Thanks, Scott.

Cy

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=179704&d=1424283627[/IMG]

New set of commons, f/g/vg.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url] for scans / prices.

Unfortunately, I'm in a little deep on these, so there maybe not as many good-guy prices, but fair.

Thanks, Scott

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=179705&d=1424283882[/IMG]

I'm with Larry and Cy,  great service Scott.
